content:
They say the smaller a creature is,
the more sensitive it becomes to the flow of air.
info: 幻雪关于捕虫网闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Yeep~ Have you started using the insect net yet?
I've seen others use them in different worlds before.
They're quite convenient, especially for those of us who can't fly.
info: 幻雪关于捕虫网闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
So, those adorable little creatures in the sky,
they'll flutter away if startled, you know.
<size=30>Especially when you're holding an insect net.</size>
info: 幻雪关于捕虫网闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1
